name: Hammer Bulge
description: An item buried in the ground that can be hammered out to reveal a reward.

fields.name: Activation Variable
fields.description: The local variable number that triggers or activates this actor.

fields.name: NPC Type
fields.description: Defines the type of NPC related to the hammer bulge.

0.name: No NPC
0.description: No NPC is associated with this hammer bulge.

1.name: Goron NPC Type
1.description: The hammer bulge is associated with a Goron NPC type.

fields.name: Reward Type
fields.description: Defines the type of reward revealed when the hammer bulge is hammered out.

6.name: Moon Pearl
6.description: The reward is the Moon Pearl.

7.name: Heart Container
7.description: The reward is a Heart Container.

9.name: Blue Tektite
9.description: The reward is a Blue Tektite.
